page.title: 06Hobbies and Sports
page.content: There are a wide range of hobbies in this area.20% of people interviewed enjoy reading.40% are interested in computers. Some people have unusual hobbies such as collecting war relics, matchboxes and fossils. 90% of all the hobbies are done in the home. Nobody interviewed belongs to a club for their hobby. SPORT 20% do not like sport. 50% enjoy football. 30% enjoy swimming. 20% enjoy snooker. 20% use their garden for sport. 50% use the park for sport. 40% play their sport often. 10% play it a lot. 20% play it a little. No-one interviewed uses a club in this area.
